description: This file is a source component for a Tic-Tac-Toe game built with the Qwik framework. It manages game state, rendering, user interactions, and accessibility features. It includes logic for move validation, winner detection, reset functionality, in-memory scorekeeping, and audit logging.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Determines the winner of the current Tic-Tac-Toe board by checking predefined winning line combinations.

methods.name: isBoardFull
methods.description: Checks if the current board state is completely filled with no nulls, indicating a draw or game end.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on a cell: validates move, updates board, checks for win or draw, updates scores, logs audit, and toggles player.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game board to an initial empty state, toggles starting player, and logs an audit entry. Scores are retained.
